I totally agree with @ruanwenjun about this point `whether there are requirements of dynamic load the jar`, in my humble opinion dynamically loading jars is less needed than you might thought in DolphinScheduler, although loading jars with some fancy technology might be cool at the first place, but they may be overused at most cases because do we really need this kind of stuff? It's better to discuss first whether we really need this considering this is big change and we just got rid of classloader things not too long ago.
